name: Swim Dash
description:
Swim Dash is an undersea swimming adventure where the more you play, the more you can contribute playing points to an organization and cause of your choice. Players can choose to support Water.org, Right to Play, Naya Jeevan, Shaukat Khanum Memorial Trust, or Barefoot College.

Be the captain of your own destiny in this exciting and endless deep sea voyage through perilous waters! You’ll have to be quick as you tap your way clear of the stinging tentacles of Bernie the Jellyfish and the scaly clutches of Scary Octy the octopus. Collect pearls as you make your way through the waters to unlock the other colorful characters and make use of power-ups and shields. These, and many more challenges await as you leave the confines of your reef behind and tap your way to subaquatic conquest!

Rockville Games will be giving a portion of the money we make from the game to good causes that you as part of our games community help us select. You collect “Karmafy Points” while playing Swim Dash, which result in real-world support for the organization that you choose. The more you play the more help they can get. It’s completely free, so start swimming for a good cause today!

Key Features:

• One-tap gameplay mechanics that continuously challenge you to beat the high score.
• Stunning visuals and a variety of deep-sea critters and characters.
• Collect pearls to unlock new characters, lives and armor.
• Support any of these charity organizations for free: Water.org, Right to Play, Naya Jeevan, Shaukat Khanum Memorial Trust, and Barefoot College.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Visit our official website at http://www.rockvillegames.com

Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/rockvillegames for updates and news regarding upcoming titles!

For more information on our charity network and organizations, visit http://karmafy.com/swimdash
